metadata.name: The Mona Lisa Heist
metadata.description:
"Without weapons, hatred, or violence" wrote Spaggiari. The sensation can be found in this piece. 

My vision of 2023 Mona Lisa takes place in Paris, at the Louvre, where Mona Lisa belongs. You can find it by visiting the well-known "Salle des États" and utilizing Augmented Reality (Artivive app) to show what lies beyond Leonardo Da Vinci's artwork.

My rendition of the Mona Lisa offers us a true art exhibition by dedicating her entire body to tattoo artists. In doing so, she transformed herself into masterpiece, like a live sculpture, with fascination, glamour, and f***ing ART.


License  
Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works
